title: Bajaj Housing Finance, Indiaâ€™s most valuable mortgage lender, sees competition ebbing
description: Bajaj Housing Finance Ltd., India's leading mortgage lender, sees competition easing as larger banks shift focus from retail to corporate credit. Chairman Sanjiv Bajaj noted the company's shares surged after a successful IPO, and it plans to expand sensibly in key markets. Home prices outside major metros remain steady.
